products.name: M20 Electric Bike for Adults - 1000W 28mph Moped Ebike 48V13A Single/48V26A Dual‚Ä¶
features: „ÄêPowerful Performance with 1000W Peak Motor & 55N.m Torque„Äë The ENGWE M20 electric bike, with its 48V/750W brushless motor peaking at 1000W and 55N.m torque, reaches speeds of 28 mph. Ideal for off-road adventures, daily commutes, and hunting trips, it ensures you have the power needed for any journey.

„ÄêExtended Range up to 94 Miles with 48V 26A Dual Battery„Äë The dual-battery version offers a maximum range of up to 94 miles. In pure electric mode, travel up to 34.17 miles, or switch to assist mode for up to 47 miles. For the ultimate long-range experience, achieve up to 68 miles on a single charge, perfect for long rides on your cruiser or mountain ebike.

„ÄêAll-Terrain Capability with 4.0*20 Inch Fat Tires & Full Suspension„Äë Conquer any terrain with 4.0*20 inch fat tires and full suspension, featuring front hydraulic and rear air shocks. These features make it perfect for extreme terrains and off-road adventures, ensuring a smooth and comfortable ride.

„ÄêAdvanced Features Including Intelligent LCD Display & 7-Speed Gears„Äë Stay informed with the intelligent LCD display showing real-time data on power, speed, and mileage. The 7-speed gears provide flexibility for various riding conditions. Dual LED headlights and rear brake lights ensure visibility and safety

„ÄêSafe and Quiet Ride with Dual LED Headlights & 30db Low Noise Level„Äë Ride confidently with dual headlights and taillights for enhanced visibility. Front and rear disc mechanical brakes offer smooth stopping power. The low noise level of just 30db ensures a quiet and peaceful journey.

products.name: Electric Bike for Adults, 1000W Peak Ebike
features: 1000W Peak Strong Motor: Funhang electric bike features a powerful 500W motor with 66.6 N¬∑m of torque and a top speed of 21.7 mph (Unlimited speed up to around 25mph). Equipped with 26" x 4.0" anti-skid fat tires, Funhang electric bike for adults is designed to easily handle all terrains like city, beach, snow, sand, mountain, and gravel roads, providing excellent grip and stability for a smooth ride.

48V 13Ah Removable Battery: This fat tire electric bike is equipped with a 48V 13AH large capacity li-ion battery, helping riders to get an impressive range of 30-35miles in pure electric mode and 55-60miles in PAS mode. Please note that the riding range will vary depending on your riding style, weight and road conditions. The battery is IPX5 waterproof and BMS protected, and can be charged on/ off the ebike, the charging time is about 6.5 hours.

Rear Cargo Rack & Lighting System: The electric bicycle comes with a sturdy and durable rear rack that can carry up to 60 pounds, effectively reducing the burden of carrying heavy loads. It is a great option for everyday shopping and delivery. The ebike is also equipped with a headlight and taillight/turn signal to enhance visibility during nighttime and improve your safety while riding at night.

High-Configuration Electric Bike: The front suspension fork and soft saddle are designed to effectively reduce impact from bumps. Funhang electric mountain bike features a professional 7-speed gearing system that allows you to adjust between 7 different gears for a comfortable riding experience. The LCD display shows your riding speed, battery level, pedal assist levels, mileage and more, making it easy for you to track your riding data. Dual 180mm disc brakes ensure riding safety.

Personalized Riding Modes: The adult electric bike offers riders 5 working modes and 5 pedal assist levels. Pure Electric Mode, Assisted Bicycle Mode, Normal Bike Mode, Cruise Mode and Booster Mode. It allows riders to choose the preferred cycling style, switching seamlessly between speed and comfort. This ebike for adults is ready for all your outdoor activities, park workouts, daily commutes, outdoor camping and off-road adventures.

products.name: EB5 Electric Bike for Adults with Peak 1000W Brushless Motor
features: 350 W Motor & Upgraded Display: The EB5 electric bike equipped with a 500 W peak motor, boosted a top speed of 20 MPH. The display panel has adjustable backlight brightness from 1-5 levels. In addition, the upgraded LCD Display provides riding data support, such as ODO/MAX/AVG SPEED, PAS mode can be customized up to 3 modes

Removable Large Battery: The EB5 e-bike is equipped with a 360 Wh battery, which covers a range of up to 25-40 miles per charge for 5-6 hours so that it can meet travel or daily commute needs. Removable battery makes charging more convenient whether you are at home or in the office

4 Working Modes: PAS mode will assist you with a moderate amount of power as you pedal the bike, kick in 1-3 levels of pedal assist to suit your needs. In pure electric mode, you can twist the throttle in any increments of power you desire. Pedal mode allows the rider to pedal as an ordinary bike. Booster mode will help you push your EB5 at 4.5-7.5 km/h when uphill, which will save you a lot of efforts

Riding Comfortably and Handily: The 26" puncture resistant tires are for greater durability. products.name: Dolphin 26" Electric Bike, Max Range 30Miles(Pedal-assist1) & 20Mph Power by Pea‚Ä¶
features: „ÄêPowerful Riding Performance„ÄëGotrax Dolphin electric bike is powered by 350W brushless motor with max speed of 20MPH. Equipped with 26" tires and a 280.8Wh removable battery, it can travel 15.5miles on pure electric mode with just 5.5 hours of charging. If in Pedal-Assist mode, it can travel up to more than 30miles. Plus, carry an extra battery for embraced cross-continental travel experiences.

„ÄêTailored Safety & Comfort„ÄëGotrax Dolphin E-bike features a height-adjustable seat and angle-adjustable handlebar, allowing for personalized comfort on extended journeys. Enhanced by dual disc brakes and front shock absorbers, it delivers powerful stopping ability, ensuring both safety and comfort. The console and bell contribute to a confident and secure ride across a variety of road conditions.

„ÄêDiverse Riding Experiences„ÄëExplore 3 riding modes for a fulfilling journey! Effortlessly cruise, exercise, or commute seamlessly ‚Äì we have you covered. Select Pure Electric Mode, Pedal-Assist Mode, or ride like a normal bike, tailoring your mode to match the purpose of your journey. Plus, the Pedal-Assist Mode offers 5 speeds, expanding your riding options for a more personalized experience.

„ÄêSport Ride Like No Other„ÄëGotrax Dolphin shimano 7-speed system is built to any terrain, ensuring utmost durability. Opting for a lower gear minimizes strain on your feet. Enter the boost mode by pressing and holding the button for 2-3s. With a 6 Km/h (3.7 mph) boost, effortlessly lessen riding fatigue, maximizing distance and usage time for a seamless experience on both daily commutes and journeys.

„ÄêEasy Assembly & After Sales Guarantee„ÄëThe electric bike is easy to assemble, most of the work already done and clear instructions and tools provided. Plus, Gotrax comes with a 365-day part assurance and customer support. If you experience any problems, we will strive to provide you with 100% satisfactory after-sales service.

products.name: Bikes Fat Tire Electric Bike Hauler - Bike Rack Hitch Style 2-Bike Carrier - 145‚Ä¶
features: Heavy-Duty Trailer Hitch Bike Rack: Transport your Rambo bikes with ease with our fat tire trailer hitch cargo carrier. With a 145lbs maximum capacity, you can haul up to 2 ebikes in one load. Bring along a fellow outdoor junky, load up, haul, and strap them up, and you're off to your next adventure.

Fits All 16"-29" Tire Sizes: Haul a wide range of bicycles, from ebikes, and mountain bikes, to road bikes. With its universal padded top clamps and adjustable tire base, this bike mount is designed to fit tire sizes between 16‚Äù to 29‚Äù. Plus, anti-theft adjustable locks for a secure fit and a firm car and platform connection for a wobble-free trip.

Compatible With Most Trucks and SUVs: Our bike racks are designed to fit most cars, trucks, and SUVs. On top of its adjustable features, this swing-away hitch bike rack has a pivoting bracket for uninterrupted cargo access. All you need to do is fold the hauler down to access your SUV‚Äôs rear door or fold it up when not in use.

Easy Storage and Set-Up: Easy fold and space-saving, our trunk bike rack folds nice and easy for hassle-free storage. Installing this hitch hauler only takes a few nuts, bolts, easy-to-follow steps, and you‚Äôre all set.

Built Rambo Tough: Rambo is the pioneer for electric bikes in the hunting industry. However, our journey doesn't end there. Our goal is to provide you with ebike accessories for every adventure for that incredible riding experience, whether you're hunting, commuting, camping, or whatever else you love doing.
